## Bio

Yo!
I am Li Yong, but most people know me as Michel.
I like to play videogames with friends, passionately watch Real Madrid play football and love to spend time with my girlfriend.

I have a background in Applied Mathematics at Delft University of Technology.
I like solving problems; the more difficult the better.
